mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT question_id, code_val(question_type), question_content, question_date, member_id, answer_result answer_id, column1 answer_content, answer_date, answer_modify_date, answer_member_id FROM question where answer_member_id = #{questionVO.answerMemberId} ORDER BY question_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start} AND #{pagingVO.end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT question_id, question_type, question_content, question_date, member_id, answer_result answer_id, column1 answer_content, answer_date, answer_modify_date, answer_member_id FROM question where member_id = #{questionVO.memberId} ORDER BY question_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start} AND #{pagingVO.end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.question_title , a.question_id , a.member_id , a.question_date , a.question_content , code_val(a.question_type) question_type , code_val(a.answer_result) answer_result , a.product_id , a.answer_member_id , a.answer_modify_date , a.answer_date , a.answer_content FROM(SELECT question_title , question_id , member_id , question_date , question_content , question_type , answer_result , product_id , answer_member_id , answer_modify_date , answer_date , answer_content FROM question ORDER BY question_date DESC) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
